Name: The Astronomy Game
About the game: Learn about astronomy and experience the wonders of space! Go on an adventure that will take you through the cosmos in Story Mode. Your lab partner has been kidnapped, and you must travel to an alien fortress to rescue him. Along the way, you will interact with 90+ educational simulations Infinitely test your space skills in Trivia Battle Mode
